segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while the sink is overflowing right next to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying that plate like it’s the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the edge, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to notice the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky behind her, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the kind of thing that makes me want to yell at the drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and the floor is a slippery mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a train wreck in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s apron is going to be soaked any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away, even though I know it’s going to end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR
